title: godoc cmd/vet: please tag the 1.2 release
body:
by **ciserlohn**: 
The recent release of go 1.2 moved the godoc and vet commands to the go.tools
subrepository.

Including the godoc and vet commands in source based downstream packages like MacPorts
would be much easier if the go.tools repository had a 1.2. tag like the default
repository.
